about_the_game:
Tactical Battles

Engage in turn-based battles with indirect control over your units. Your main task is to choose the entry lines for your units and arrange their formation strategically. Plan several moves ahead to maximize your combat potential. You'll also have an arsenal of skills at your disposal, allowing you to support your allies or wreak havoc on your enemies.

Choose your hero!

Each has a unique skill set.

Turn the Enemy into a Chicken!

The game features dozens of spells to help you navigate a wide variety of situations.

Assemble the Perfect Army

With over a hundred different units divided into 9 classes, you can develop unique strategies and uncover hidden synergies.

Travel the Global Map

Explore a diverse map filled with various locations, from the Temple of the Sun to the Thieves' Guild. Each site offers unique bonuses, but you won't be able to visit them all, so plan your route wisely.

Bosses

If you're weary of fighting brigands and skeletons, test your skills against mightier foes.

Artifacts

Discover a wide range of artifacts to suit every taste and playstyle. And much more!
